entries.cannot_fire_without_lookat: You can't fire a missile unless you have a lookat target.
entries.gunner_fire_missile_failed: A gunner's attempt to fire a missile has failed.
entries.vampiric_repair_other_underway_recipient: Repairs are underway on your most heavily-damaged system.
entries.cannot_repair_other_must_shutdown: The target ship needs to close any s-foils they might have and come to a stop before you can repair them.
entries.cannot_repair_other: You cannot repair another ship right now.
entries.pirateraid_none_available: There don't appear to be any pirates paying attention locally.
entries.inspacereload_notice: NOTE: A missile rack less than half empty can not usually be reloaded, due to weapon rack inner workings.
entries.inspacerepair_service_fee: A small service fee might be applicable regardless of if repairs are necessary or not.
entries.spacerepair_no_pob: Your ship is too large to be serviced by a repair or rearmament vessel.
entries.bomberstrike_not_at_player: Fleet Operations will not allocate craft to attack that target.
entries.inspacerepair_ship_not_safe2: You are currently engaged in combat maneuvers with enemy vessels and repairship can't defend itself.
entries.inspacerepair_ship_not_safe: Scans indicate you are still currently targeted by hostile craft. Unable to call in the repair vessel.
entries.spacereload_confirm_instructions: Request reload again if you do. Otherwise, Do nothing and the rearmament ship will leave.
entries.spacerepair_cannot_pay: You can't pay for this. We're departing. Good luck.
entries.spacerepair_not_enough_repair_rearm: You don't have enough money in the bank to cover repairs and rearmament. Departing.
entries.spacerepair_not_enough_money_rearm: You don't have enough money in the bank to cover rearmament. Departing.
entries.spacerepair_no_reload_needed: Scans indicate that you don't appear to need any munitions reloaded that we can supply. Departing.
entries.spacerepair_not_enough_money_repair: You don't have enough money in the bank to cover repairs. Departing.
entries.spacerepair_unnecessary: Scans indicate that you don't appear to have any repair needs that we can help with. We are departing.
entries.spacerepair_no_station: There are no repair craft available to be dispatched in this sector.
entries.sub_system_restart: SUB-SYSTEM RESTART COMMENCING. INITIALIZATION SUBROUTINES COMING ON-LINE.
entries.system_disrupted: ALERT! ALERT! ALERT! SUB-SYSTEM DISRUPTED. ATTEMPTING SYSTEM RESTART.
entries.multiple_systems_disrupted: WARNING! WARNING! WARNING! MULTIPLE SYSTEMS DISRUPTED. ATTEMPTING SYSTEM RESTART.
